# Results Summary Document

Quarto for building summary tables for the meta-analysis results.

```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(tidyverse, readxl, writexl, here, flextable, orchaRd, patchwork)
```


## Plant scale

### Multilevel meta-analytic model (MMA)

Read in

```{r}
coupeMR5 <- readRDS(here("Results", "Models", "Coupe", "coupe_MR5.rds"))
coupeMR5_rob <- readRDS(here("Results", "Models", "Coupe", "coupe_MR5_rob.rds"))
imp_coupeMR5 <- readRDS(here("Results", "Models", "Coupe", "imp_coupe_MR5.rds"))
imp_coupeMR5_rob <- readRDS(here("Results", "Models", "Coupe", "imp_coupe_MR5_rob.rds"))
coupepb5 <- readRDS(here("Results", "Models", "Coupe", "coupe_MR5_pb.rds"))
imp_coupepb5 <- readRDS(here("Results", "Models", "Coupe", "imp_coupe_MR_pb5.rds"))
```
